description: Garlicky tahini and roasted eggplant make a perfect warm salad everyone will love.
name: Roasted Eggplant Salad with Tahini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium lemon, juice and grated zest

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Place the eggplant slices in a large bowl, drizzle with oil and garlic (reserve 1/2 a teaspoon) and mix well.
Divide the eggplant slices between two large baking sheets in a single layer and roast for 20 minutes, flip the slices then roast for a father 15 minutes.
In a non stick pan, toast the pumpkin seeds with the cumin and a drizzle of oil for 23 minutes, tossing frequently.
Whisk together the tahini, lemon juice and zest, yoghurt and reserved garlic until smooth. Add a little water if necessary to loosen the dressing.
Arrange the little gem leaves on a large serving platter and top with the roasted eggplant. Scatter the pumpkin seeds and chopped coriander on top, drizzle the dressing over the dish and serve.
